item.description:
I figured I would make the first activity as simple as possible. Easy access, great parking and no assembly required. I will plan on arriving at 615 and will put a red shirt or scarf on the antenna of my car or truck (dont know what I''' be driving that day. We can chat for a few minutes then leave about 630 for a 60 minute walk... or less if you would like. If anyone would like to inline skate or bike that is fine too.

After the walk we could eat at Krua Thai or head to Marc Anthony's for Pizza & Salad. We can decide then.
item.how_to_find_us: A Red Flag on the Antenna of my Car/Truck

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Cape Cod Canal Walk
